patterns_discovered: Cross-platform accessibility testing (macOS VoiceOver, Windows NVDA)
gotchas_discovered: Focus trap edge cases with no focusable elements
Potential differences in screen reader announcement behaviors
Need for manual verification of automated accessibility improvements
recommendations: Continue detailed manual accessibility testing for all interactive components
Create standardized testing scripts for future accessibility verification
Regularly update accessibility documentation with new findings
Consider automated screen reader testing tools to complement manual testing
